Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits advertisements on television and radio of cannabis and cannabis products
Summary: Prohibits advertisements on television and radio of cannabis and cannabis products subject to a $5000 fine and license or registration revocation after notice and an opportunity to be heard.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to prohibiting advertisements on television and radio of cannabis and cannabis products
